# Edward Parry (Roman Catholic priest)

Edward Parry  (1862 â€“ May 1922) was the second Prefect of the Prefecture Apostolic of Zambese. He was appointed in January 1920 and served until his death in 1922. (Before it was a Prefecture Apostolic, he was its Superior from 1911 to 1915.)
